name: Pack It In.
description:
===============================================================

RESOLUTION FIXED RESOLUTION FIXED RESOLUTION FIXED RESOLUTION 

===============================================================

Welcome to PACK IT IN, a 3D Puzzle plat-former, where you need to pack a suitcase, but all the clothes and accessories are scattered around in facilities with death looming over the horizon, Beat 8 levels to complete the game, many puzzles and parkour, can you Pack it in?

Check out my youtube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC12RiMM05RBUmJkjvoEzBBg?view_as=subscriber
